documents.document: @Emre_C_Deniz Excellent, nice and low poly, should be pretty performant..
@MightyApe I mean, I'm sure you could always reverse this problem with some Harribo Sugar Free Gummy Bears.
@kurtruslfanclub @_WOLFPACKED I really wanna see this happen when you do a critical miss in a modern RPG https://t.co/wHHzR2PdhZ
@kurtruslfanclub @_WOLFPACKED The typical accident is the good old "Punch yourself in the nose with a gun" problem :P
@delaneykingrox Plus, if they wanted to ban people with a high chance of being terrorists, they'd have to ban South Carolina folks.
@Serrels Can you suggest some improved slogans? :D
@DeaExLena @Rlan2 Speaking as in Australian living in NZ.. I feel your pain :(
@KeirRice @pmbillenglish Funny, because I don't see a case for voting for Bill English right now.
@NewshubPolitics @pmbillenglish Yes, I'm sure sending back legal immigrants with green cards will "work itself out". Strong leadership bro.
@c_barilla I believe that does happen in Canada?
@kurtruslfanclub Or lots of spread out enemies, yeah
@kurtruslfanclub Seems like single shots practical. Full auto = hilarious sprayfest.
@kurtruslfanclub Reference: https://t.co/6E0evX4LtP Not quite as bad as I'd expect, but still pretty bad.
@kurtruslfanclub It could be pretty hilarious, animate the gun recoiling everywhere and bullets spraying all over the place
@kurtruslfanclub Badass, yes, plausable... Hmm... depends if hitting anything smaller than a house is important :P
@justin_lester Welcome on a city level, still not convinced they are on a national level. *Cough* @pmbillenglish
@SimoneGiertz Needs more hair, and then it'll be perfect.
@SimoneGiertz I believe you should enter politics by building a new robot president. Given your past robots it'd have to be an improvement.
@delaneykingrox It's too late. You've awakened the gazebo.
@KeirRice @pmbillenglish Ahh, you see he's "Showing strong leadership" by going to see a film then having a sleep.
@Wanderlustin Let's look at all sides fairly, then realize one side is a human rights destroying garbage fire.
@laurclinn I mean like. Do you two come as a box set? Because 12/10 then.
@laurclinn 11/10, best boyfriend. Where do I acquire one?
This sounds like if @colinmeloy did the Rick and Morty theme.. https://t.co/0Dr21kmPnd
@spamoir @LxFrancis "Does someone need a huuug" is clearly the point to escalate to :)
@NewZulund @lucyamorris as is mine. Still about 50% punishment. But satisfying punishment.
@lucyamorris always choose the one that might be most useful for kicking Nazis.
@greencatherine @rnz_news Too busy telling us that he's watching Pork Pie apparently
@jazzrozz Ice Cream and Whisky could be the answer too
@laurclinn A+ Boyfriend choice. 10/10
@Sia @ACLU Don't have a lump of cash right now, but they can have my $15/month for the foreseeable future :) https://t.co/7nBXmuEwmv
@pmbillenglish Pretty sure there is something way more important going on right now you need to be addressing #muslimban
@donttrythis I like this new side of you, Adam! :)
@KlickTock @Official_GDC Yeah, I don't see myself attending GDC in America again for at least another 4 years. Much worse for muslim friends
@kaffiene_nz Ann Coulter. Enough said.
@kiaradoesart That came out looking awesome, good work! :D
*Screams for the remainder of 2017* https://t.co/DwnOZtVPnl
@HelloMissPotter @Jorelephant Haha yeah, just be ambiguous "There are many nudes of a Leaping Tiger founder, yessss"
@HelloMissPotter Reply that no, it includes scantily clad pics of @Jorelephant
@ColeStark However I can confirm that driving a convertible does seem to work.
@ColeStark I'm sitting in front of a desk fan, but I'm not sure it's helping.. :P
@jazzrozz Oh hey! I didn't realize we were the biggest jam in NZ this year :)
@lucyamorris Wellington, it's pretty shit eh.
@Wolfire @KeenSWH @beamng @bohemiainteract Yeah, same here, don't beleive they've asked anyone for permission.
@CraigPeebles Yeah, I'm really shocked at how quickly he's launched into the messed up executive orders.
@CraigPeebles Fair enough, I think it's just really hard to talk about right now because everyone is so frightened about what's going on.
@CraigPeebles No worries! I know you're a decent fella, and wouldn't want you to be perceived as having views you didn't :)
@CraigPeebles Yeah agreed for sure, but I think it's a mistake (at this stage) to consider the scale of the problem as similar on both sides
@CraigPeebles Which, I absolutely know is not your intention. BUT we've all gotten very used to seeing that argument used.
@CraigPeebles Of picking out a handful of problematic people on the other side to go "Look, THEY are violent too, that means we're OK"
@CraigPeebles Which is fair, but I think part of the reason that gets a bad reaction is that it was a Trump campaign tactic too.
@CraigPeebles Yeah, and I assumed as much. BUT given the lack of clarity brought by social media, and only having seen you talk about that.
@CraigPeebles And I can see that those, seen in isolation, would potentially paint a picture of that being your major concern about it all.
@CraigPeebles The only politics I've seen from you on social media have been about attacks on Trump supporters.
@CraigPeebles Maybe folks just can't tell where you stand, and are thinking you're a lot further from their views than you actually are?
@amazingafroman Crash Bandicoot! You could almost vertex paint a bunch of that! :P
@amazingafroman Oh god yeah. So much stuff in Automation is like totally clean undetailed plastic/metal objects. tilables win for that.
@amazingafroman I'd also say the single most important thing in UVs is that the person painting them knows what's going on :P
@amazingafroman Or just go Automation style, and use tilable stuff EVERYWHERE. I love tilables for many things.
@amazingafroman Plus have a good think about where that texture resolution is going to count most.
@amazingafroman And like, if some bits need to not be distorted, prioritize keeping them in once piece.
@amazingafroman Ehh, I mean, kinda? Need to have a good think about how you're gonna paint stuff. Where seams are OK etc.
@amazingafroman Can you work out how to paint the texture on it? Is it free of weird distortion and seams? If yes to both, then all is good
@mcmansionhell Is there a car-hole emoji?
@Powerhoof Would be good if you could chase them about it, and let any other folks you know who have been put up there. :)
@Powerhoof Right, me neither. Seemingly nor did anyone on that list. I've tweeted at them, and reported their KS (https://t.co/7mV2thhwE2)
@KeenSWH @beamng @Wolfire @bohemiainteract Did you approve being listed on this platform? - https://t.co/iJyi3I8hCp
@FcpnchStds @JoinSquad @StudioWildcard_ @Powerhoof @spiderlinggames Did you approve being listed on this platform? - https://t.co/QAKUKC1j9Z
@jckkrr I gotta say, that's a LOT more exciting! :D
@lucyamorris @EarlyNinja And their "Vote on Games" page.. wtf - https://t.co/QAKUKC1j9Z
@lucyamorris Whoa, wtf, they've got pretty much EVERY early access game listed there...
@jckkrr I could, but I don't really have anything much to say about it. Aus Day never really interested me.
@NewZulund You still coming over? ;)
@scalzi I don't know, how do you feel about the fact she'd have to cheat on that handsome sci-fi writer she's with to be with you?
@kindofstrange I think after a hard week of moving house, @AquiL4X and @lucyamorris could use one :)

@liamesler 99 percent invisible, The Allusionist, Freakonomics.
Educational about all kinds of weird and wonderful topics.
@expectproblems Or "I rented my old one to a lovely couple so I could afford the payments on a new one"
@expectproblems Though it gets weird if you follow that metaphor too far.. .. "I sold my city penis for a bigger one in the suburbs"
@expectproblems "I figured it was time to get out of the rental market and become a penis-owner"
@spamoir @expectproblems I take comfort that I'm an ocean away from your revenge :P
@spamoir @expectproblems I partially blame strayan accents and our inability to stop saying vowels. Edamamaaaaate.
@liamesler @TonyAlbrecht Such a role model. I aspire one day to have a beard like Tony.
@expectproblems The key question here is; what is your favorite store on the citadel?
@amazingafroman @tonycoculuzzi I mean, that worked so well for Half Life 3!
@lucyamorris sweet! Seeya tonight with the keys. Can you FB msg me you and Mike's phone numbers? (I lost em)
@lucyamorris it's a pretty chill drive tbh. And weather along trip looks okay. Should even be sunny in welly when you arrive.
@liamesler IKR! And damn they get to do some cool stuff when they don't have to render a frame in 1/50th of a sec *shakes fist at VFX*
@liamesler I know just about enough to run in circles screaming as soon as I read the bit about sand. :P
@kitsubasa Ahh, excellent, good to know it's hitting all the notes of racism AND classism. A+, would be bigoted again.
@kitsubasa Mmm, now it'd be 'of course the *INSERT FOREIGNER HERE* have much worse culture than us and England is dying'
@liamesler @lucyamorris same tho
@spamoir @Emre_C_Deniz Should I be (more) afraid of you? :P
@lucyamorris ONE OF US
@natsum77 @Gaohmee #4's Moustache game is A+
@Gaohmee @natsum77 Well, I mean, they all look the same in this case, in that they're all hot AF.
@liamesler I mean, yeah, probably stop with the dimethyl mercury shakes for breakfast.
@jiggsy @liamesler - Join the club :P https://t.co/87cQvCJM75
@delaneykingrox Just mutter darkly about how the last person who asked that was mysteriously lost at sea...
@theladyvictoria @tonycoculuzzi 3ds max is an idiot. But it's MY idiot damn it.
@amazingafroman @tonycoculuzzi yeah, but not to completely rework 7 years of pipeline, custom tools & assets :p
